links.title: Apple Supplier Finisar Gets Snapped Up for $3.2 Billion
links.description: One of Apple Inc.'s ( AAPL) suppliers of laser and optical equipment, Finisar Corp. ( FNSR) , reached a deal to be bought for about $3.2 billion by II-VI Inc. ( IIVI) . Shares of Finisar closed up significantly at 15.4% higher to hit $21.79 on Friday.
